entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Prodigal Status
entries: You gain one feat of your choice.

entries.name: Prodigal Adaptation
entries: You gain a +2 racial bonus in one of the following skills: Bluff, Computer Use, Demolitions, Disguise, Escape Artist, Knowledge (Sciences), Knowledge (Mathematics).

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write English and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Enhanced Optics
entries: You can see twice as far as a normal human in starlight, moonlight, torchlight, and similar conditions of poor illumination. You retain the ability to distinguish color and detail under these conditions.

entries.name: Obey the Order
entries: You gain a +2 racial bonus in two of the following skills: Listen, Gather Information, Search, Spot.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write English and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in the dark up to 60 feet. Darkvision is black and white only, but it is otherwise like normal sight, and operatives can function just fine with no light at all.

entries.name: Lightfoot
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Operation Skills
entries: You gain a +2 racial bonus in three of the following skills: Computer Use, Demolitions, Disguise, Escape Artist, Move Silently, Open Lock, Ride, Search, Spot, Survival, Swim.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write English and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Lightweight
entries: Your long jump is up to 25 feet and your high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

entries.name: Lightfoot
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Windrunner
entries: You gain a +3 racial bonus to Jump.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write English and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Lucky
entries: You gain a +1 racial bonus to all saving throws.

entries.name: Gift From Heaven
entries: You gain a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. This bonus stacks with the Aeon's +1 bonus on saving throws in general.

entries.name: Strato Meo
entries: You gain a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls with thrown and ranged weapons.

entries.name: Weak Constitution
entries: Your base walking speed decreases to 25 feet.

entries.name: Shadowstalker
entries: You gain a +2 racial bonus to Climb, Jump, Listen, and Move Silently checks.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write English and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Arrival of the Forest
entries: Once per day, you can comprehend and communicate with animals. You are able to ask questions of and receive answers from animals, although the spell doesnâ€™t make them any more friendly or cooperative than normal. Furthermore, wary and cunning animals are likely to be terse and evasive, while the more stupid ones make inane comments. If an animal is friendly toward you, it may do some favor or service for you.

entries.name: Vision Through Leaves
entries: You gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against illusions.

entries.name: Strato Meo
entries: You gain a +2 racial bonus on Craft (Alchemy) and Listen checks.

entries.name: Giant Slayer
entries: You gain a +4 dodge bonus to Armor Class against monsters of the giant type. Any time a creature loses its Dexterity bonus (if any) to Armor Class, such as when it's caught flat-footed, it loses its dodge bonus, too.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write English and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Artifical Life
entries: You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe. You are immune to disease. You don't need to sleep, and magic-like effects can't put you to sleep. For the purpose of natural healing, you still need to partake in 8 hours or more of light activity. Any significant interruption during your rest prevents you from healing.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in the dark up to 60 feet. Darkvision is black and white only, but it is otherwise like normal sight, and operatives can function just fine with no light at all.

entries.name: Manufactured
entries: You gain 4 extra skill points at 1st level and 1 extra skill point at each additional level.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write English and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Cybernetic Enhancement
entries: You gain one Progress Level 6 cybernetic.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write English and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Lucky
entries: You gain a +1 racial bonus to all saving throws.

entries.name: Stable Birth
entries: You gain a +4 bonus on ability checks made to resist being bull rushed or tripped when standing on the ground (but not when climbing, flying, riding, or otherwise not standing firmly on the ground).

entries.name: Resistant to Disease
entries: You gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against poison.

entries.name: FX Dodge
entries: Your gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like effects.

entries.name: Transporter
entries: You can move at your base walking speed even when wearing medium or heavy armor or when carrying a medium or heavy load (unlike other creatures, whose speed is reduced in such situations).

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write English and one extra language of your choice.
